Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager
public class RegistrationManager extends Object
Singleton class that manages a Course catalog and Student directory. Contains a registrar User that can use the manager
Author:
Warren Long

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static class 
    RegistrationManager.Registrar
    A class to represent the registrar user of the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationManager

      private RegistrationManager()
      Constructs a new Registration Manager. This is a private constructor to allow the RegistrationManager class to act as a singleton. Constructs a new course catalog and new student directory, and initializes a new registrar using the local registrar.properties file.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the registrar inner class cannot be constructed with the given properties.

  • Method Details

    • createRegistrar

      private void createRegistrar()
      Creates a new instance of the Registrar inner class with information imported from the local registrar.properties file.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be found or if it's details are invalid.

    • hashPW

      private String hashPW(String pw)
      Returns a hashed version of the given password using the HASH_ALGORITHM variable algorithm.
      Parameters:
      pw - The password to hash.
      Returns:
      The hashed version of the password.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the password cannot be hashed.

    • getInstance

      public static RegistrationManager getInstance()
      Returns a static, singleton instance of RegistrationManager.
      Returns:
      a new RegistrationManager if there isn't one already, the old one if there was.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if constructing a new RegistrationManager and a registrar cannot be constructed with the local registrar properties.

    • getCourseCatalog

      public CourseCatalog getCourseCatalog()
      Returns the course catalog.
      Returns:
      The courseCatalog.

    • getStudentDirectory

      public StudentDirectory getStudentDirectory()
      Returns the student directory.
      Returns:
      The studentDirectory.

    • getFacultyDirectory

      public FacultyDirectory getFacultyDirectory()
      gets the faculty directory
      Returns:
      the faculty directory

    • login

      public boolean login(String id, String password)
      Allows the user to login. Sets the currentUser as the type of user the ID/Pass are associated with.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the User.
      password - password of the User.
      Returns:
      true if the ID and Password are linked to an account, false if there isn't any.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no user associated with the given information, or somebody is already logged in.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs the user out. CurrentUser becomes null.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Returns the current user.
      Returns:
      the current user.

    • clearData

      public void clearData()
      Resets the courseCatalog and studentDirectory. Also clears currentUser.

    • enrollStudentInCourse

      public boolean enrollStudentInCourse(Course c)
      Returns true if the logged in student can enroll in the given course.
      Parameters:
      c - Course to enroll in
      Returns:
      true if enrolled
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is not a student

    • dropStudentFromCourse

      public boolean dropStudentFromCourse(Course c)
      Returns true if the logged in student can drop the given course.
      Parameters:
      c - Course to drop
      Returns:
      true if dropped
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is not a student

    • resetSchedule

      public void resetSchedule()
      Resets the logged in student's schedule by dropping them from every course and then resetting the schedule.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user is not a student
